hash.before-save:
if @issue.contracts_any?
unless @issue.demand? @selected_sprint = @issue.sprint if @issue.fixed_version.present? version = @issue.fixed_version issue = version.fixed_issues&.first @issue.parent = issue&.parent
if @issue.parent.present? @issue.sprint = @issue.parent.sprint else @issue.sprint = @issue.product_backlog end end end
puts "Issue fields filled-up" if selected_sprint_changed? end
hash.name: GERCONT_auto_fill
hash.author: diogo.neiva@saude.gov.br
